name: Revive(A 3D RPG Game)
description: This is the rise of a new chapter. The five sanctuaries were destroyed by a radioactive explosion. that resulted to  disappearance of trees. Luckily the animals were survived but as a result they used their spells as their protected mechanism but in a very long time they couldn't manage to escape from their own magical spells. The five heroes named Riandrel, Damian, Kokoi, Jung, and Aurora were the heroes who can revive these five sanctuaries to be a friendly shelter again for these animals that was called in danger species. By their purpose, mission, and power they can turn the in danger species into revived species. Their story say something about their purpose to revive.
